markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">
[Terrain Transposition](/Spells.aspx?ID=1873)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 384 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 90 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You mystically transpose your current location with another. While in a wilderness environment, you transport yourself and items you're holding to a clear space you can see within range. If you have [Favored Terrain](/Feats.aspx?ID=495) and both your starting and ending position are in your favored terrain, the range increases to 180 feet. If you have an animal companion and it is adjacent to you, you can transport it along with you to an adjacent open space, but if this spell would bring any other creature with you, even in an [extradimensional](/Traits.aspx?ID=67) container, the spell is lost.
name: Terrain Transposition

summary: You mystically transpose your current location with another.
summary_markdown: You mystically transpose your current location with another.
text: Terrain Transposition Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 384 2.0 Range 90 feet --- You mystically transpose your current location with another. While in a wilderness environment, you transport yourself and items you're holding to a clear space you can see within range. If you have Favored Terrain and both your starting and ending position are in your favored terrain, the range increases to 180 feet. If you have an animal companion and it is adjacent to you, you can transport it along with you to an adjacent open space, but if this spell would bring any other creature with you, even in an extradimensional container, the spell is lost.
